}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "Radxa Zero V1.51" is silkscreened on board top
{{See also|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Amlogic]]'' S905Y2 Quad-Core ARM Cortex-A53 (@1.2GHz) *GPU: ''Mali-G31 MP2'' (OpenGL ES3.2, OpenCL, AFBC) :VPU (with 4K VP9 and 4K 10-bit H265/H264 decoding) *Memory: 1GB (SDRAM) LPDDR4 *Storage: TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card *WiFi: [[AMPAK]] AP6212 - [[Broadcom]] BCM43430 (1T1R) :SDIO 2.0 WiFi, 802.11bgn + BT 4.0 *USB: 1x USB 3.1 port, 1x USB 3.0 OTG port *GPIO: 1x 40-pin headers *Power Source: USB Type-C supporting USB PD 2.0 and Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0
==Links of Interest== *[https://linuxgizmos.com/tiny-radxa-zero-sbc-runs-armbian-on-amlogic-s905y2/ ''Tiny Radxa Zero SBC runs Armbian on Amlogic S905Y2'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2021/06/16/radxa-zero-sbc-quad-core-raspberry-pi-zero-w-alternative/ ''Radxa Zero SBC'' on '''CNX|Software''' ]
